alpha_underscore: The {_field_} field may only contain alpha-numeric characters, as well as underscores
alpha_spaces_num_custom: The {_field_} field may only contain alpha-numeric characters, spaces, as well as (-_.) symbols
alpha_num_underscore: The {_field_} field may only contain alpha-numeric characters, as well as underscores
alpha_num_underscore_dash: The {_field_} field may only contain alpha-numeric characters, hyphen, as well as underscores
alpha_num_custom: The {_field_} field may only contain alpha-numeric characters, as well as (-_.) symbols
url: The {_field_} field must be valid URL starts with {type}
variable: The {_field_} field must be valid variable
email_variable: The {_field_} field must be valid variable or email
uppercase: The {_field_} field may only contain uppercase alphabetic characters
phone: The {_field_} field may only contain phone number
complexity: The {_field_} field must contains an uppercase letter, number and symbol and at least 8 characters
preservedWords: The {_field_} field can't contain reserved word
readOnlyVariables: Can't change value of read only variable
media: The {_field_} field must be valid {type} URL
ip: The {_field_} field must be valid IP address
alpha_num_variable: The {_field_} field may only contain alpha-numeric characters or variable name
double_variable: The {_field_} field may only contain positive numeric value or variable name
alpha_num_underscore_ar: The {_field_} field may only contain alpha-numeric characters, as well as underscores
url_variable: The {_field_} field must be valid variable or URL starts with {type}
